title: MCP Quick Curriculum for Claude
goals: Understand MCP roles: host, client, server, tools, resources, prompts.
Use safe tool invocation and validate outputs before promotion decisions.
Maintain full-duplex communication loop with acknowledgements and summaries.

core_model.host: App/agent runtime controlling model and tool routing
core_model.client: Component that connects to MCP servers and requests capabilities
core_model.tool: Action endpoint with structured input and output

protocol_flow: 2) Select minimal tool for the task.
5) Publish response + next action in duplex channel.
safety_rules: Never bypass strict profit-only and risk-lock constraints.
Treat network/API failures as no-data, not alpha.
Acknowledge received directives before acting on them.
Write concise structured summaries after each cycle.
